insert into t_direct_user (id, time, user_id, spreader_id, total_invest, first_total_rebate, second_total_rebate) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{spreaderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{totalInvest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{firstTotalRebate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{secondTotalRebate,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update t_direct_user set time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, spreader_id = #{spreaderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, total_invest = #{totalInvest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, first_total_rebate = #{firstTotalRebate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, second_total_rebate = #{secondTotalRebate,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, time, user_id, spreader_id, total_invest, first_total_rebate, second_total_rebate from t_direct_user
